name: Norbert Kovács
title: Medior Application Developer
about: Hello, I'm Norbert, a medior application developer at ZF Hungária. I work in an international team developing automated solutions to support production processes. I'm passionate about creating clean, efficient, and user-friendly applications, and currently serve as the tech lead for one of our projects. With four years of professional experience, I specialize in full-stack development and enjoy turning complex challenges into elegant solutions.

I'm constantly looking to improve, especially in refining my coding practices and deepening my understanding of UI/UX design. I strive to be a supportive teammate and a developer who delivers maintainable, thoughtful, and well-designed software.
